english_translation: Narrated by Ali (may Allah be pleased with him): He said: 'The Takbeer is: Allah is Greatest, Allah is Greatest, there is no deity except Allah, Allah is Greatest, Allah is Greatest, and to Allah belongs all praise'. Zaid ibn Ali (may Allah be pleased with him) also said: Takbeer is obligatory upon men and women from the residents (of cities) and travelers, those who pray in congregation and those who pray alone, after every obligatory prayer, after the Friday prayer, and there is no Takbeer after the two Eids prayers nor after the optional prayers'
